testcase.name: As a user I would like to see all characters in Breaking Bad
As a DEA staff I want to make sure Walter White is Heisenberg
As a user I shouldn't send a request to invalid endpoint
testcase.system-out:
[@feature] As a user I shouldn't send a request to invalid endpoint BEFORE Request method: GET Request URI: https://breakingbadapi.com/api/invalidEndPoint Proxy: <none> Request params: <none> Query params: <none> Form params: <none> Path params: <none> Headers: Accept=*/* Content-Type=application/json; charset=UTF-8 Cookies: <none> Multiparts: <none> Body: <none> HTTP/1.1 200 OK Server: nginx/1.10.3 (Ubuntu) Date: Thu, 29 Apr 2021 19:09:04 GMT Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Transfer-Encoding: chunked Connection: keep-alive X-Powered-By: Express Access-Control-Allow-Origin: * X-RateLimit-Limit: 10000 X-RateLimit-Remaining: 9943 X-RateLimit-Reset: 1619723854 Accept-Ranges: bytes Cache-Control: public, max-age=0 Last-Modified: Fri, 26 Mar 2021 16:47:13 GMT ETag: W/"921-1786f6ec47e" Vary: Accept-Encoding Content-Encoding: gzip

testcase.name: As a user I want to see how many episodes are there in each season
As a user I shouldn't send a request to invalid endpoint
